doc:
Petrea Burchard https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Petrea_Burchard 0 Petrea Burchard (born March 23, 1955) is an American actress, and voice actress. She is sometimes credited as Celeste Burch in the anime she appears in. Her most recognizable role to date is as the English voice actor for fictional character and space pirate, Ryoko Hakubi from the Japanese animated series Tenchi Muyo!. Petrea_Burchard ( born March_23_,_1955 ) is an_American_actress , and voice_actress . She is_sometimes_credited as Celeste_Burch in the_anime she appears in . Her_most_recognizable_role to date is as the_English_voice_actor for fictional_character_and_space_pirate , Ryoko_Hakubi from the_Japanese_animated_series_Tenchi_Muyo ! .
